H0.text: Light is what plants require, along with air, water, and nutrients, in order to live and survive.

H1.text: Money is what plants require in addition to air, water, and nutrients in order to live and survive.

H2.text: Gravity is what plants require, in addition to air, water, and nutrients, in order to live and survive.

H3.text: Entertainment is what plants require in addition to air, water, and nutrients in order to live and survive.

A4.text: plants need light, not just soil and water

A5.text: photosynthesis is a system of biological processes by which photopigment-bearing autotrophic organisms... convert light energy — typically from sunlight — into the chemical energy necessary to fuel their metabolism
